content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the organisational structure charts (including names, job title, email address & contact numbers for Place, Housing, Property & Regeneration.
This may also include Communities, Homelessness, Highways, Environment, Planning, Construction & Place directorates covering the following job titles:
Director, Assistant Director, Head of Service, Service Manager / Senior Managers.
I look forward to your response.
Yours faithfully,
Katie Murphy

Dear Katie,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Housing Structure
Charts which we received on 12/05/2025.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 10/06/2025. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Please note that from 1^st January 2025, as part of our commitment to
improving services, the council will accept FOI requests via the online
form which can be found here:
[1]Freedom of Information and Environmental Information requests |
Sheffield City Council
Please bookmark this link for future requests.
The online form is linked directly to our systems in the FOI service as
part of our continued improvement to streamline processes.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [2][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: Katie Murphy <[FOI #1280172 email]>
Sent: 12 May 2025 14:23
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Housing Structure Charts
[You don't often get email from [3][FOI #1280172 email]. Learn why this is
important at [4]
https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentific...
]
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the organisational structure charts (including names, job
title, email address & contact numbers for Place, Housing, Property &
Regeneration.
This may also include Communities, Homelessness, Highways, Environment,
Planning, Construction & Place directorates covering the following job
titles:
Director, Assistant Director, Head of Service, Service Manager / Senior
Managers.
I look forward to your response.
Yours faithfully,
Katie Murphy
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this email address for all replies to this request:
[5][FOI #1280172 email]
Is [6][Sheffield City Council request email] the wrong address for Freedom
of Information requests to Sheffield City Council? If so, please contact
us using this form:
[7]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Disclaimer: This message and any reply that you make will be published on
the internet. Our privacy and copyright policies:
[8]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
For more detailed guidance on safely disclosing information, read the
latest advice from the ICO:
[9]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
[10]
https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlo...
Please note that in some cases publication of requests and responses will
be delayed.
If you find this service useful as an FOI officer, please ask your web
manager to link to us from your organisation's FOI page.
